## NFTCollection.getAllNFTAddresses() method

Get the mint addresses for all NFTs on this collection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAllNFTAddresses(): Promise<string[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string\[\]&gt;

mint addresses for all minted NFTs

## Example


```jsx
const nfts = await program.getAllNFTAddresses();
```
